mapper.select: select ads_id as id, title as title, img_id as imgId, order_no as orderNo, state as state, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from tbl_ads order by create_time desc LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ads ( title, img_id, order_no, state, create_time ) value ( #{title}, #{imgId}, #{orderNo}, #{state}, now(), )
mapper.select: select ads_id as id, title as title, img_id as imgId, order_no as orderNo, state as state, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from tbl_ads where ads_id = #{adsId}
